headline.main: Valeant Under Pressure to Beef Up Management as New Board Meets
headline.print_headline: Valeant Under Pressure to Beef Up Management as New Board Meets

docs.snippet: Drug company Valeant Pharmaceuticals Inc is under pressure from investors to introduce more transparency into its operations and expand its management ranks to regain credibility in the investment community, people familiar with the situation said...
docs.lead_paragraph: Drug company Valeant Pharmaceuticals Inc is under pressure from investors to introduce more transparency into its operations and expand its management ranks to regain credibility in the investment community, people familiar with the situation said.

headline.main: Europe Tries to Shut Down Routes as Migrant Flow Intensifies

docs.snippet: European leaders announced an agreement this week aimed at stopping the flow of migrants trying to reach Europe through the Balkans. In January and February, more than 123,000 migrants landed in Greece, compared with about 4,600 in the same period...

byline.original: By LARRY BUCHANAN and SERGIO PEÇANHA

docs.lead_paragraph: European leaders announced an agreement this week aimed at stopping the flow of migrants trying to reach Europe through the Balkans. In January and February, more than 123,000 migrants landed in Greece, compared with about 4,600 in the same period last year.

headline.main: Chipotle Co-CEOs Suffer Pay Cuts in 2015
headline.print_headline: Chipotle Co-CEOs Suffer Pay Cuts in 2015

docs.snippet: Chipotle's top two executives suffered big pay cuts after a series of food scares sent sales plunging toward the end of 2015. But they each still took home more than $13 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chipotle's top two executives suffered big pay cuts after a series of food scares sent sales plunging toward the end of 2015. But they each still took home more than $13 million.

headline.main: Corbin Throws 3 Scoreless Innings in Arizona 12-3 Victory
headline.print_headline: Corbin Throws 3 Scoreless Innings in Arizona 12-3 Victory

docs.snippet: Patrick Corbin, who was limited to 16 starts last year after returning from Tommy John surgery, threw three scoreless innings and the Arizona Diamondbacks hit three home runs in the first three innings to defeat the Kansas City Royals 12-3 on Frid...
docs.lead_paragraph: Patrick Corbin, who was limited to 16 starts last year after returning from Tommy John surgery, threw three scoreless innings and the Arizona Diamondbacks hit three home runs in the first three innings to defeat the Kansas City Royals 12-3 on Friday.

headline.main: Judge: BP Not to Pay Oil Industry Losses From Moratorium
headline.print_headline: Judge: BP Not to Pay Oil Industry Losses From Moratorium

docs.snippet: A federal judge ruled that BP does not have to pay for economic losses other businesses suffered when the federal government shut down deep-water drilling in the wake of BP's catastrophic 2010 oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that BP does not have to pay for economic losses other businesses suffered when the federal government shut down deep-water drilling in the wake of BP's catastrophic 2010 oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.

headline.main: Gov. Snyder Calls for Investigation of Health Department
headline.print_headline: Gov. Snyder Calls for Investigation of Health Department

docs.snippet: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder on Friday called for an investigation of how his health department handled an outbreak of Legionnaires' disease in the Flint area as well as high lead levels among residents who were drinking tainted water from the Flint ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder on Friday called for an investigation of how his health department handled an outbreak of Legionnaires' disease in the Flint area as well as high lead levels among residents who were drinking tainted water from the Flint River.
